attributes.action: Provide more police on the streets of Pentyrch and Gwaelod Y Garth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to ask the Prime Minister to take immediate action to increase the number of police patrolling the streets of Pentyrch and Gwaelod Y Garth (Cardiff). Please sign if you feel that the present situation of one policeman is insufficient. Thank you.
